summary: 2001 DODGE DURANGO HAS ENGINE FAILURE.  DAIMLER CHRYSLER WILL NOT COVER THE COSTS TO HAVE A NEW ENGINE PUT IN MY VEHICLE.  OIL SLUDGE PROBLEM AND THEY ARE SAYING IT'S DUE TO LACK OF MAINTENANCE.  THE VEHICLE HAS 26,000 MILES AND I HAVE EMAILS AND COMPLAINTS FROM HUNDREDS OF OTHER INDIVIDUALS WITH THE SAME COMPLAINTS.
